code: import{Tracer}from'core/tracers';import{Array2DRenderer}from'core/renderers';class Element{constructor(value){this.value=value;this.patched=false;this.selected=false;}}class Array2DTracer extends Tracer{getRendererClass(){return Array2DRenderer;}set(){let array2d=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];this.data=array2d.map(array1d=>[...array1d].map(value=>new Element(value)));super.set();}patch(x,y){let v=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:this.data[x][y].value;if(!this.data[x][y])this.data[x][y]=new Element();this.data[x][y].value=v;this.data[x][y].patched=true;}depatch(x,y){this.data[x][y].patched=false;}select(sx,sy){let ex=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:sx;let ey=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:sy;for(let x=sx;x<=ex;x++){for(let y=sy;y<=ey;y++){this.data[x][y].selected=true;}}}selectRow(x,sy,ey){this.select(x,sy,x,ey);}selectCol(y,sx,ex){this.select(sx,y,ex,y);}deselect(sx,sy){let ex=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:sx;let ey=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:sy;for(let x=sx;x<=ex;x++){for(let y=sy;y<=ey;y++){this.data[x][y].selected=false;}}}deselectRow(x,sy,ey){this.deselect(x,sy,x,ey);}deselectCol(y,sx,ex){this.deselect(sx,y,ex,y);}}export default Array2DTracer;
